docs.snippet: The widely fancied Spain tries to withstand Group H and avoid the pilloried fate of France and Italy.
docs.lead_paragraph: With little inconvenience, Spain completed its recovery from its jolting opening loss to Switzerland, resembled its mighty self somewhat more, eased past Chile on Friday night in Pretoria and wound up precisely where everyone foresaw it: atop Group H in South Africa's World Cup. It won another of those World Cup matches in which everybody won something as Chile clung to second place and advancement because Switzerland could not manage to defeat Honduras in the concurrent match.
docs.abstract: The widely fancied Spain tries to withstand Group H and avoid the pilloried fate of France and Italy.

headline.main: World Cup Live: Chile vs. Spain

headline.main: World Cup Photo Replay: Uruguay vs. South Korea

docs.snippet: Uruguay vs. South Korea     Round of 16
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay vs. South Korea Round of 16

docs.snippet: South Korea and Uruguay christen the knockout stage of South Africa's World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: On an exquisite 81st-minute goal from Luis Suarez, Uruguay delighted its 3.5 million citizens by besting South Korea 2-1 in Port Elizabeth rain and accessing its first World Cup quarterfinal since its semifinal showing of 1970 in Mexico. The smallest nation left in the field for the knockout stage will play either the United States or Ghana next Friday.
docs.abstract: South Korea and Uruguay christen the knockout stage of South Africa's World Cup.

headline.main: World Cup Live: Uruguay vs. South Korea

docs.snippet: A live minute-by-minute description of the Round of 16 elimination match at Rustenburg, South Africa.
docs.lead_paragraph: The thrilling run of the United States national team at the World Cup has come to end, finished by Asamoah (Baby Jet) Gyan's goal in the third minute of extra time and a slew of terrific saves from Ghana goalkeeper Richard Kingson.
docs.abstract: A live minute-by-minute description of the Round of 16 elimination match at Rustenburg, South Africa.
